questions.question: What's the polling rate of my keyboard
questions.long: Polling rate is the rate at which key event data is sent to the host PC.  All keyboards compiled with QMK since September 2019 have the polling rate set at 1,000Hz by default, including all of IDOBAO's keyboards.

questions.question: VIA does not detect my keyboard
questions.short: You may need to "sideload" the VIA JSON file for your keyboard
questions.long: Not all keyboards are registered with VIA's keyboard database. Check your keyboards VIA page (on this site) and see if you need to sideload a VIA JSON definition file.
